overview:
GMR Transcription is one of the premier transcription companies providing transcription opportunities to more 2000 transcriptionists. We are focused on providing accurate and affordable transcription services and assures you a warranty of 98% accuracy. Our dedicated and experienced team handles your transcription jobs with the utmost professional care. Our primary goal is to provide a professional transcription service to you at affordable rates.

GMR Transcription is headquartered in Tustin, CA. All our transcriptionists are US based. We have 7000 visitors visiting to our blog site. Of which most are people applying for job. We would like a profile of your ezine to be covered in our transcription services blog.

We are constantly expanding our businesses and searching for experienced transcriptionists.
